newsArray.title: MS Dhoni Favourite Bowler: धोनी ने इस भारतीय गेंदबाज को बताया अपना फेवरेट बॉलर, सोशल मीडिया पर वीडियो वायरल- WATCH VIDEO
newsArray.description: टीम इंडिया के पूर्व कप्तान एमएस धोनी का अक्सर सोशल मीडिया पर वायरल होता हैं. हाल ही में एमएस धोनी के पसंदीदा गेंदबाज के बारे में उनसे एक इवेंट में पूछा गया. एक इवेंट में एमएस धोनी ने बताया कि मौजूदा समय में उनके फेवरेट गेंदबाज जसप्रीत बुमराह हैं.

newsArray.title: Virat Kohli Upset as fan Calls Him ‘Chokli’- Viral video
creator: CricketCountry Staff
newsArray.description: During one of the training sessions, Virat Kohli was minding his own business working his hand movements with the bat when a fan randomly called him as 'chokli', which made the batter visibly upset.The post Virat Kohli Upset as fan Calls Him ‘Chokli’- Viral video appeared first on Cricket Country.

newsArray.title: England’s Joe Root regains pole position in ICC Men’s Test Batting Rankings
creator: Sambad English Bureau
newsArray.description: New Delhi: England batter Joe Root has regained the pole position in the ICC Men’s Test Batting Rankings. Root has dethroned New Zealand’s Kane Williamson to take the top spot and now begin his ninth stint as the top-ranked batter in men’s Tests. Root managed to amass 291 runs over three matches against the West [...]The post England’s Joe Root regains pole position in ICC Men’s Test Batting Rankings first appeared on Sambad English.
